certifications.title: Data Analytics and Visualization Job Simulation

education.field_of_study: Computer Science and Engineering with specialization in Big Data Analytics

projects.name: Fruit Recognition using Machine Learning
projects.description: Developed a fruit recognition system utilizing VGG19 technology, achieving over 90% accuracy. The model accurately identifies five fruits: apple, banana, mango, orange, and pineapple, even in blurry images. Key innovation includes a custom modification to the VGG19 architecture, integrating an unblurring layer for enhanced performance.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Developed a weather app using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to display real-time weather information. Integrated a weather API to fetch and show live weather data for different locations. Ensured the app works well on various devices by using responsive design techniques.

projects.name: Online Market Place
projects.description: Designed and developed an online marketplace using Python and Django, featuring essential functionalities such as item listing, category filtering, price specification, and detailed item descriptions. Implemented user-friendly features including item search, related item suggestions, and real-time status updates. Integrated a secure user authentication system with signup and login capabilities.

experiences.description: Interned at APSSDC, where I gained proficiency in Python programming and Django, enhancing my web development skills. Utilized Python and Django to build and optimize back-end services.
